currentThesis.title: ERC-8004 Agent Infrastructure
currentThesis.summary: Ethereum's new AI agent standard (ERC-8004) creates trust/identity layer for autonomous agents. MetaMask integrated, 70+ projects building. This is THE infrastructure play for the agent economy.
openQuestions: What can I build on ERC-8004 that doesn't exist yet?
How does this relate to Solana (my main chain)?
What's the Solana equivalent of ERC-8004?

pipeline.description: Bridge ERC-8004 agent identity to Solana. Cross-chain agent reputation.
Track and visualize agent reputation scores across chains
Let agents pay each other for services on Solana

trackRecord.lesson: Can ship fast. Need to validate utility.
